name: Burkhard C. Wünsche
content: Burkhard Wünsche's Official Home Page Burkhard WünscheMSc Computer Science, PhD Computer Science Senior Lecturer Email burkhard@cs.auckland.ac.nz Ph. +64 9 3737 599 x83705 Fax. +64 9 3737 453 Office Science Centre (Building 303), Rm 490 Address Computer Science Department, The University of Auckland, Private Bag 92019, Auckland Introduction I am a Senior Lecturer (equivalent to an Assistant Professor in the USA) at the the Department of Computer Science of the University of Auckland. I am also the director of the Graphics Group and of the division for Biomedical Imaging & Visualization My PhD was in collaboration with the Bioengineering Institute of the University of Auckland and is titled A Toolkit for Visualizing Biomedical Tensor Fields in Finite Element Data Sets. Note that even though I am correctly spelled Wünsche my official spelling here is Wuensche. Research Interests Scientific and Biomedical Visualization, Medical Imaging, Information Visualization Computer Graphics, Game Technology Computer Aided Geometric Design, Simulation Algorithms Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR) Human Computer Interfaces (HCI), Computer Vision, Cognitive Psychology Presentation of research themes (July 2011). Research Supervision I am interested in supervising MSc and PhD theses and undergraduate and graduate projects in all research areas related to Computer Graphics including Game Technology, Computer Art, Biomedical Imaging & Visualization, Physically-based modelling, and cognitive psychology. A list of potential project and thesis topics can be obtained on request though I am more than happy if you propose your own research topic to me :-) So far I have supervised these students. Industry Links and Collaborations Biomedical imaging and visualisation: Visualization Center C, Norrköping, Sweden. VisCG - Visualization and Computer Graphics Research Group, University of Münster, Germany. SIMTICS, Auckland, New Zealand. Auckland Bioengineering Institute, Auckland, New Zealand. HITLab NZ, Christchurch, New Zealand. Publications I have published 7 refereed international journal articles, 92 refereed international conference articles, contributed to 6 books and edited 2 books.
